subject: Thank you for your refinance application, we accepted your appication
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this tender will expire TODAY):
$343,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this simple form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://zdqrtx.com/
